post:
Have you heard? We have a new node! Blitz is up and ready to go!

Use this coupon code during checkout: **KVM-BLITZ**

KVM!  
Premium bandwidth on a shared GigE port

Supermicro hardware

E3-1230 Xeons with 16.00 GB RAM (ECC)  
RAID10 array  
ULTRA LOW density
